definition[0]: a discussion in which people in different places talk to each other using telephones or video equipment
definition[1]: to have a meeting in which people in different places talk to each other using telephones or video equipment
definition[2]: a meeting in which people in different places can talk to each other using videos or computers, so that each person can see and speak to all the others
example[0]: I have arranged a teleconference with the export sales team.
